channel.title: Really short compiler2
channel.description:
This time I think I posted in the right spot, and It is coded
When you right click on compiler.bat, and click edit you'll see a bunch of crap that sometimes doesnt work. You need to replace it with this-
[code] @ECHO OFF title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_0x\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
again replace the x with the update version you have of JDK v6.
And if your run server doesn't work replace it with this-
[code]@echo off color 0a title Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
:D :D :D :D :D[s][i][b]Enjoy!!!!![/b][/i][/s] :D :D :D :D :D

item.title: Really short compiler2
item.dc:creator: @ThE-DaWg22 ThE-DaWg22
item.description:
@ThE-DaWg22 wrote:

This time I think I posted in the right spot, and It is coded

When you right click on compiler.bat, and click edit you’ll see a bunch of crap that sometimes doesnt work. You need to replace it with this-

@ECHO OFF title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_0x\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

again replace the x with the update version you have of JDK v6.

And if your run server doesn’t work replace it with this-

@echo off color 0a title Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Enjoy!!!
